Configuration.startupLisp:
(setj WorldObjects:MaintainCollisions true) (setj WorldPathSystem:MaintainCollisionsForeground false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainEffects true) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainActions true) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainAnims true)
(setj WorldObjects:MaintainSounds false) ;; for testing in a noisey world (setj MushDLR223.Utilities.DLRConsole:SkipStackTraces false)
;; just testing connections '(progn (setj WorldObjects:MaintainEffects false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainActions false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainAnims false) (setj WorldObjects:GleanAssetsFromFolders false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainGroupMetaData false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainObjectUpdates false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainSimObjectInfoMap false) (setj WorldObjects:SendSimObjectInfoMap false) (setj WorldObjects:SendOnDataAspectUpdate false) )
;; for just simexport '(progn (setj WorldObjects:MaintainSimObjectInfoMap false) (setj SimObjectImpl:AffordinancesGuessSimObjectTypes false) (setj WorldObjects:IgnoreKillObjects true) (setj WorldObjects:GleanAssetsFromFolders false) (setj WorldObjects:SendOnDataAspectUpdate false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainGroupMetaData false) (setj MushDLR223.Utilities.DLRConsole:SkipStackTraces true) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainEffects false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainActions false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainAnims false) (setj WorldObjects:SendSimObjectInfoMap false) (setj SimAssetStore:DisableQueue true) )
(setj GridAddress "https://login.agni.lindenlab.com/cgi-bin/login.cgi") (setj GridAddress "http://login.osgrid.org/") (setj GridAddress "OSGrid") ;; .. depends on grid.xml (setj GridAddress "agni") ;; .. depends on grid.xml (setj GridAddress "localhost") ;; .. depends on grid.xml
(setj GlobalPasswd "abc123")
(setj StartLoc "uri:last&173&51&38") (setj StartLoc "uri:Isabel&44&107&58") (setj StartLoc "uri:Fairyverse&115&125&21") (setj StartLoc "uri:Boardroom&128&125&29") (setj StartLoc "uri:MilSpecMoo&128&128&32")
(setj StartLoc "uri:MilSpecMoo&72&135&38") (setj StartLoc "uri:Diva Texture test&128&128&38") (setj StartLoc "uri:Wright Plaza&128&128&38") (setj StartLoc "uri:LBSA Plaza&128&128&38") (setj StartLoc "last") (setj StartLoc "Halca/128/128/38") (setj StartLoc "Ahern/2/3/40") (setj StartLoc "Penn State Isle 2/49/127/25") (setj StartLoc "MASA Group/115/156/50") (setj StartLoc "Belphegor/152/41/63") (setj StartLoc "last") (setj StartLoc "Neverdol/151/74/1974") '(setj StartLoc "uri:portia&128&128&22")
;;; Settings that are ran in ClientManager such as create-botclient (load "personalAccts.lisp") (load "personalInstallConfig.lisp")
Configuration.startupClientLisp:
(setj UseAIMLBotModule False) (setj UseCycWorldModule False) (setj UseTheSimiansModule False) (setj UseIRCModule False) (setj UsePrologScripting False) (setj UseAutoLogin False) (setj UseGUI False) '(setj MasterName "Nephrael Rajesh")
(load "personalInstallConfig.lisp")
'(if UseGUI (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "showgui tray")) ;; minimize radegast to tray - not good on mono becasue the hwnd not created
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "debug Debug") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load CogbotRadegastPluginModule")
(if UsePrologScripting (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load PrologBotModule"))
(if UseIRCModule (progn (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load IrcRegionModule") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread irc #logicmoo-cogbot cogbot_ irc.freenode.net") ;; to connect to IRC ))
(if UseCycWorldModule (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load CycWorldModule")) (if UseTheSimiansModule (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load TheSimiansModule")) (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "debug Debug")
;; log into Secondlife (if UseAutoLogin (progn (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "login") ;; does the login if the user didnt press the button (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "waitforlogin 60") ;; wait for the auto-login (1 minute) ))
Configuration.onLogin:
(if UseAIMLBotModule (progn (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load AIMLBotModule.dll noservitor") ;;; (setj AIMLBotModule:WorldObjectsForAimLBot:UseServitorEngine False) (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load AIMLBot.dll") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load AltAIMLbot.dll") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load AIMLBotModule.dll blocked") ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @off") ;; makes the AIMLBotModule complete loading before moving on '(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @log -DICT") ;; turns off subsitution reporting ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @log -dict +graph -user -asset +aimltrace") ;; turns off subsitution reporting ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "(setj AIMLBotModule:WorldObjectsForAimLBot:DefaultMaxRespondToChatPerMinute 600)") ;; once every three seconds ;;(setj AIMLBotModule.WorldObjectsForAimLBot:DefaultMaxRespondToChatPerMinute 600) '(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @gui") ))
(if (>= (thisClient.BotLoginParams.URI.IndexOf "osgrid" ) 0) (progn (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@"thread setmaster Daxxon Kinoc")) (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@"goto MilSpecMoo/128/128/26")) (if UseAIMLBotModule (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @off")) ;; turns on aiml for all users '(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance nobake") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance send") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@ "im $master I am located in {0}" (str thisClient.Network.CurrentSim.Name)) ) ))
(if (>= (thisClient.BotLoginParams.URI.IndexOf "localhost" ) 0) (progn (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@"thread setmaster Daxxon Kinoc")) (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@"goto portia/135/222/54")) '(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance nobake") '(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance send") (if UseAIMLbotModule (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @on")) ;; turns on aiml for all users (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@ "im $master I am located in {0}" (str thisClient.Network.CurrentSim.Name)) ) ))
(if (>= (thisClient.BotLoginParams.URI.IndexOf "agni" ) 0) (progn (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@"thread setmaster Daxxon Jaxxon")) (if UseAIMLBotModule (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @on") );; turns on aiml for all users (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@ "im $master I am located in {0}" (str thisClient.Network.CurrentSim.Name)) ) (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance send") ))
(if (>= (thisClient.BotLoginParams.URI.IndexOf "portia" ) 0) (progn (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@"thread setmaster Daxxon Kinoc")) (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@"goto portia/135/222/54")) '(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance nobake") '(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance send") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@ "im $master I am located in {0}" (str thisClient.Network.CurrentSim.Name)) ) ))
;;(if UseAIMLBotModule (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @on")) ;; turns on/off aiml for all users (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance nobake")
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread setmaster Nephrael Rae") ;; change this to your name on AGNI (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread setmaster BinaBot Daxeline") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread setmaster Douglas Miles") ;; change this to your name on OpenSim (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread setmaster Annie Obscure") ;; change this to your name on AGNI/OpenSim (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "setmaster Nephrael Rajesh") ;; change this to your name on AGNI
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance nobake")
;;(setj AIMLBotModule:WorldObjectsForAimLBot:DefaultMaxRespondToChatPerMinute 20) ;; once every three seconds ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "simbot start") ;; turns on/off Simian module thinker ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance bake") ;; set bakes ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "say I am logged in now!") ;; ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "Follow* Douglas Miles") ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "Follow* $master") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "say I am logged in now!") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance nobake") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance send") ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @reload") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "tasks debug")
(if UseAIMLBotModule (progn '(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @log -DICT") ;; turns off subsitution reporting ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @log -dict +graph -user -asset +aimltrace") ;; turns off subsitution reporting ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @on") )) (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@ "im $master I am located in {0}" (str thisClient.Network.CurrentSim.Name)) ) (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "say Cilent Startup complete!") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "debug Info")
